attributes.action: “MAKEINUK” campaign.Government should provide some incentives to FDI  companies.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit happens so happens but it is going to effect all foreign companies   as they are in big ambiguity whether to stay in UK or NOT.Especially startup companies, entrepreneurs and small scale companies are mostly effected. Due to Brexit  the fear of upcoming changes in trading law they may turn down their investments in UK. It’s going to effect largely to the future UK economy and the growth.This campaign is mainly to startups to encourage them as their part in the contribution to UK economy.
attributes.background:
“MAKEINUK” campaign for FOREIGN DIRECT INVESTMENTS (FDI)
All foreign companies will act exactly like a UK companies, follow UK law, they contribute to UK economy, employment   by paying taxes and creating jobs. Then every foreign company has right to be recognized as MAKE IN UK company

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
